articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: Crazy Rich Asians crooner Cheryl Koh who recently auditioned for popular reality talent show American Idol moved judge Lionel Richie to tears singing his 1980s romantic ballad Endless Love beautifully.
articles.title: #Showbiz: Malaysian singer Cheryl K wows Lionel Richie on 'American Idol' - New Straits Times
